name: elephant plush
notes:
mortimer and millie elephant are besties that are always having fun together and being adorable while they are at it!

this pattern has several optional designs! you can choose from 4 different ear styles. you can add the bow or leave it off. you can make these friends in so many ways and they’ll always make a great pair!

pdf download includes extra photos for clarification. the free pattern on my site includes a couple of video tutorials for the trickier rounds. 

*details:*
skill level-advanced beginner
written in us terms
supplies needed- any worsted weight yarn, g/6 4.25 hook, polyfil stuffing, safety eyes
special stitches- fpsc, bpsc
finished size should be approximately 6-7” tall.  

find the free written pattern at [auburnelephant.com/home/elephant-plush][1]


  [1]: https://auburnelephant.com/home/elephant-plush
